doc:
Hippolyte Girardot https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hippolyte_Girardot 0 Hippolyte Girardot (born Frédéric Girardot; 10 October 1955) is a French actor, film director and screenwriter. He is the father of actress Ana Girardot. He is not related to actress Annie Girardot. Hippolyte_Girardot ( born Frédéric_Girardot ; 10_October_1955 ) is a_French_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter . He is the_father of actress_Ana_Girardot . He is_not_related to actress_Annie_Girardot .
